command.action: CaptureImpl("user.number-string", Rule("(eight | three | fifteen | nine | eighty | four | forty | two | seven | one | thirteen | twenty | seventeen | seventy | eighteen | ten | fourteen | sixteen | fifty | ninety | zero | five | thirty | twelve | sixty | six | nineteen | eleven) ([and] (zero | one | two | three | four | five | six | seven | eight | nine | oh | ten | eleven | twelve | thirteen | fourteen | fifteen | sixteen | seventeen | eighteen | nineteen | twenty | thirty | forty | fifty | sixty | seventy | eighty | ninety | thousand | million | billion | trillion | quadrillion | quintillion | sextillion | septillion | octillion | nonillion | decillion | hundred))*"))

Close the active grid. Show mouse grid.

Show or hide every other label box so more of the underlying screen content is visible.
Show or hide rulers all around the window.
Increase or decrease the opacity of the labels behind text for the full mouse grid (also returns new value).
Increase or decrease the opacity of the labels behind text for the full mouse grid (also returns new value).
Increase or decrease the opacity of the background of the full mouse grid (also returns new value).
Increase or decrease the opacity of the background of the full mouse grid (also returns new value).
increase or decrease size of everything.
increase or decrease size of everything.

x = mouse_x()
y = mouse_y()
mouse_drag(0)
new_x = x + 100
new_y = y + 0
mouse_move(new_x,new_y)
mouse_drag(0)
sleep(1000ms)
new_x = new_x + 100
new_y = new_y + 100
mouse_move(new_x,new_y)
mouse_drag(0)
sleep(1000ms)
new_x = new_x + 0
new_y = new_y + 100
mouse_move(new_x,new_y)
mouse_drag(0)
sleep(1000ms)
new_x = new_x - 200
new_y = new_y - 200
mouse_move(new_x,new_y)
mouse_drag(0)
mouse_release(0)

Disable a mode. Disable a mode. Disable a mode. Clears the active language mode, and re-enables code.language: extension matching. Disable a mode. Enable a mode. Starts the "racing" mouse mode. Enable relative compass mouse guide.
Press and release a mouse button. Close the active grid. Releases any held mouse buttons.
Press and release a mouse button. Close the active grid.
Press and release a mouse button. Close the active grid.
Press <modifiers> :down. Press and release a mouse button. Press <modifiers> :up. Close the active grid.
Press <modifiers> :down. Press and release a mouse button. Press <modifiers> :up. Close the active grid.
Press and release a mouse button. Press and release a mouse button.
Press and release a mouse button. Press and release a mouse button. Press and release a mouse button. Close the active grid.
Press and hold/release a specific mouse button for dragging. Close the active grid.
Press and hold/release a specific mouse button for dragging. Close the active grid.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Scrolls down.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Scrolls down.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Scrolls down continuously.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Scrolls up.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Scrolls up.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Scrolls up continuously.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Starts gaze scroll.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Stops scrolling.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Scrolls left.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Scrolls left.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Scrolls right.
move the mouse cursor to the center of the currently active window. Scrolls right.

drive the mouse along a curve.

sets the speed of the mouse as it drives forward..
increases the speed of the mouse as it drives forward..
decreases the speed of the mouse as it drives forward..
